Making Workshops Work For You

Online Course with Jennie Love

$159.95 – Lifetime Access. Risk-Free Guarantee.

• Create Engaging Workshops

    Design workshops that offer value and memorable experiences.

  • Effective Teaching Techniques

    Develop the skills needed to become a great teacher and leader.

  • Learn To Price for Profit

    Learn how to set prices that reflect the value of your workshops.

  • Marketing Your Workshops

    Discover effective ways to find and attract students.

• Acclaimed Farmer-Florist

    Jennie’s work has been featured in the New York Times, Martha Stewart Weddings, Brides Magazine, The Knot, and the Philadelphia Inquirer, and she has been named a top wedding florist by Martha Stewart.

  • Sustainable Innovator

    Known for her lush, textural floral designs, Jennie built her farm from scratch using sustainable “seed-to-centerpiece” practices.

  • Community Leader

    Jennie served on the Association of Specialty Cut Flower Growers’ leadership board for nine years and founded the Regenerative Flower Farmers Network, with over 1,000 members worldwide.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 6 (48 mins)

settings.text: I teach the 4 most effective avenues I use to promote all of my workshops.

settings.title: What is the difference between School courses and Workshops?
settings.content:
Workshops vary from sixty minutes to over four hours of instruction, see individual courses for details. Each of these courses offer lots of valuable information on a specific topic that you can digest in a short amount of time and put into action right away.

School course content is much more comprehensive and covers broad topics. School courses are meant to serve as a long-term reference tool that you will use all throughout the course of your flower farming journey. Each course includes 6 modules, which each contain multiple video training sessions, instructor worksheets, and handouts, and an FAQ archive. All of the course sessions (including the FAQs) are searchable by keyword, so you can always find and go directly to the information that you need at any given time.

settings.title: May I watch more than once?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have unlimited access?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have to watch at a certain time?
settings.content: You can watch the courses anytime at your convenience. Purchased On-Demand Courses will appear in your library immediately and will always be there for viewing.

settings.title: Do you offer course discounts?
settings.content: Yes, once you are part of our course family (owning any online school or workshop) you will be eligible for $50 off additional school courses.

settings.title: I live outside of the USA, may I purchase a course?
settings.content: Yes, our online courses are available internationally.

settings.title: Are the courses focused on growing in a specific region or area?
settings.content: No, the courses are based on methods to apply to any growing area.
